languages.text: "Тем славнее его деяния. Легко биться с богами, когда ты сам — бог. Но если ты человек — вот тут-то и начинается сага о славном подвиге".
"It makes his deeds all the more glorious. Battling gods is child's play when you yourself are a god. But if you are a man — now that is the stuff that sagas are made of."
languages.original_text: "Тем славнее его деяния. Легко биться с богами, когда ты сам — бог. Но если ты человек — вот тут-то и начинается сага о славном подвиге".

traits.locale_text: "It makes his deeds all the more glorious. Battling gods is child's play when you yourself are a god. But if you are a man — now that is the stuff that sagas are made of."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “这只会让他的事迹更加光辉灿烂。如果你自己就是神明，那与别的神明开战不足为奇。可你如果仅仅是凡胎肉躯——这才是真正值得大书特书的传奇史诗。”
languages.original_text: "It makes his deeds all the more glorious. Battling gods is child's play when you yourself are a god. But if you are a man — now that is the stuff that sagas are made of."

traits.locale_text: “这只会让他的事迹更加光辉灿烂。如果你自己就是神明，那与别的神明开战不足为奇。可你如果仅仅是凡胎肉躯——这才是真正值得大书特书的传奇史诗。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Hace que sus hazañas sean mucho más gloriosas. Enfrentarse a los dioses es algo normal cuando eres un dios. Pero si eres un hombre... de ahí salen las mejores sagas».
languages.original_text: "It makes his deeds all the more glorious. Battling gods is child's play when you yourself are a god. But if you are a man — now that is the stuff that sagas are made of."

traits.locale_text: «Hace que sus hazañas sean mucho más gloriosas. Enfrentarse a los dioses es algo normal cuando eres un dios. Pero si eres un hombre... de ahí salen las mejores sagas».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「それが彼の行為をより輝かしいものにしている。自分自身が神であれば、神々との戦いは児戯にすぎない。だが、お前が人間であるなら…それはサーガを造るものとなるのだ」
languages.original_text: "It makes his deeds all the more glorious. Battling gods is child's play when you yourself are a god. But if you are a man — now that is the stuff that sagas are made of."

traits.locale_text: 「それが彼の行為をより輝かしいものにしている。自分自身が神であれば、神々との戦いは児戯にすぎない。だが、お前が人間であるなら…それはサーガを造るものとなるのだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Das macht all seine Taten umso glorreicher. Gegen Götter zu kämpfen ist ein Kinderspiel, wenn man selbst ein Gott ist. Wenn man aber ein Mensch ist ... das ist der Stoff, aus dem Sagen sind."
languages.original_text: "It makes his deeds all the more glorious. Battling gods is child's play when you yourself are a god. But if you are a man — now that is the stuff that sagas are made of."

traits.locale_text: "Das macht all seine Taten umso glorreicher. Gegen Götter zu kämpfen ist ein Kinderspiel, wenn man selbst ein Gott ist. Wenn man aber ein Mensch ist ... das ist der Stoff, aus dem Sagen sind."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Ce qui rend ses exploits plus grandioses encore. S'opposer à des dieux est un jeu d'enfants lorsqu'on en est un soi-même. Mais dans le cas d'un humain... Sa destinée devient digne d'une saga. »
languages.original_text: "It makes his deeds all the more glorious. Battling gods is child's play when you yourself are a god. But if you are a man — now that is the stuff that sagas are made of."

traits.locale_text: « Ce qui rend ses exploits plus grandioses encore. S'opposer à des dieux est un jeu d'enfants lorsqu'on en est un soi-même. Mais dans le cas d'un humain... Sa destinée devient digne d'une saga. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "It makes his deeds all the more glorious. Battling gods is child's play when you yourself are a god. But if you are a man — now that is the stuff that sagas are made of."

languages.text: "Öyleyse yaptıkları çok daha şanlıdır. Kendin tanrıysan tanrılarla savaşmak çocuk oyuncağıdır. Fakat bir insansan... İşte destanlar bunun için yazılır."
languages.original_text: "It makes his deeds all the more glorious. Battling gods is child's play when you yourself are a god. But if you are a man — now that is the stuff that sagas are made of."

traits.locale_text: "Öyleyse yaptıkları çok daha şanlıdır. Kendin tanrıysan tanrılarla savaşmak çocuk oyuncağıdır. Fakat bir insansan... İşte destanlar bunun için yazılır."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
